name: JustInTimeLeasingDemo
0:
”Alexa, open just in time leasing demo”
”Alexa, start just in time leasing demo”
”Alexa, launch just in time leasing demo”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: just in time leasing demo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Just In Time Leasing Assistant Demo is here to provide an example of how our virtual assistants can help your properties grow with the digital age.

Using Amazon Alexa, our virtual assistant can tour your prospects from anywhere around the world, and show off what your community has to offer. You can also track all of your new leads that tour using our Leasing Assistant Dashboard, and follow up with them about their experience touring.
